app.name: vanilla-i18n-attr
app.description: Zero-dependency i18n for HTML via data attributes

hero.heading: Translate static sites in seconds
hero.subheading: Switch languages, persist preferences, and keep markup declarative.

fallback.title: Fallback behaviour
fallback.description: When a key is missing in the active locale, the library walks the fallback chain before leaving the original text untouched.

attributes.title: Attribute translations
attributes.description: Use data-i18n-attr to translate title, placeholder, aria-label, and any attribute you need.

notices.rtl_hint: RTL mode sets dir="rtl" on the <html> element and toggles body[data-dir].

missing.demo: This key only exists in English to show the fallback.
